titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/27/1998--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from: (1) January 28 until February 3, 1998; (2) February 5 until February 11, 1998; and (3) February 12 until February 24, 1998. Provides for a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from February 13 until February 23, 1998.
